description: Get latestet readings for a device in JSON format

response_fields.name: sensors_last_reads
response_fields.description: Array::Each item has the latest end_read to each sensor, in that corresponding order. sensor_id: 1 => array[1], sensor_id: 2 => array[2], and so on. array[0] is always 0

requests.curl:
curl "https://mrwattson-api.herokuapp.com/devices/e190b3e83c/reading_events/latest" -X GET \

	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Access-token: zGT_CU6ImDGt0sr2-GLapA" \

	-H "Expiry: 1476185217" \
